item.title: Report E-2025050232
item.description:
Report E-2025050232

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-10T03:46:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-05-09
  • City: CINNAMINSON
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: PITT OHIO GROUND LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Upon arrival at the origin terminal, the drum was discovered to be leaking inside the trailer. Further investigation revealed that the bottom of the drum was punctured by a protruding nail head on the wooden skid. The drum was immediately placed into an overpack container to prevent further release. Due to the nature of the incident and hazardous material, the package specifications markings were not able to be safely obtained.

item.title: Report X-2025050994
item.description:
Report X-2025050994

Identified by scraper @ 2025-06-10T03:46:53+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-05-07
  • City: MONROE TOWNSHIP
  • State: NJ
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE CO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: A HAZMAT FELL FROM A WALL WHILE BEING UNLOADED AND ONE OF THE TWO BOTTLES IN THE PACKAGE CRACKED, LEAKIN A SMALL AMOUNT OF ISOPROPNOL FROM THE PACKAGE. NO OTHER PACKAGES WERE AFFECTED AND NO EMPLOYEE CAME INTO CONTACT WITH THE PACKAGE. THE ON DUTY RESPONDER CLEANED UP THE SPILL AND BROUGHT THE PACKAGE BACK TO THE DMP FOR DISPOSAL.

  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0

  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Upon receiving and opening the trailer at Veolia's TSDF in Flanders, NJ it was quite evident that two large electronic storage cabinets had shifted during transportation. One of the cabinets impacted a lead acid battery which was shipped on a wood pallet. The impact caused the battery to leak a small amount of fluid.
